rf_mode.title: RF mode
rf_mode.description: Mode for TX/RX radio multiplexing: Frequency- or Time- Domain Division

dl_earfcn.title: DL EARFCN
dl_earfcn.description: Downlink E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell

tac.title: Tracking Area Code
tac.description: Tracking Area Code in hexadecimal representation (range 0x0000 to 0xffff)

root_sequence_index.title: Root Sequence Index
root_sequence_index.description: Range: 0 to 837. Set the PRACH root sequence index (SIB2.rootSequenceIndex field). It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.

gtp_addr.title: GTP Address
gtp_addr.description: String. Set the IP address (and optional port) on which the GTP-U packets are received. The default port is 2152. It is normally the IP address of the network interface connected to the core network.

mme_list.title: MME list
mme_list.description: Optionnal. List of MME to which the gNodeB is connected

mme_addr.title: MME Address
mme_addr.description: IP address (and optional port) of S1AP SCTP connection to the MME. The default port is 36412.

plmn_list.title: PLMN list
plmn_list.description: List of PLMNs broadcasted by the eNodeB, at most 6 (default: 00101)

attach_without_pdn.title: Attach Without PDN
attach_without_pdn.description: Optional boolean. Indicates if PLMN supports attach without PDN connectivity.

reserved.title: Reserved
reserved.description: True if the cell is reserved for operator use.

lte_handover_a3_offset.title: A3 offset for LTE handover
lte_handover_a3_offset.description: RSRP gain offset between gNBs which will trigger handover

lte_handover_time_to_trigger.title: Time to Trigger for LTE handover
lte_handover_time_to_trigger.description: Time to triger after which LTE handover will be triggered if A3 offset is reached

dl_earfcn.title: DL EARFCN
dl_earfcn.description: Downlink E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the neighbour cell

pci.title: Physical Cell ID
pci.description: Physical Cell ID of the neighbour cell

cell_id.title: Cell ID
cell_id.description: Concatenation of enb_id and cell_id of the neighbour cell

websocket_password.title: Websocket password
websocket_password.description: Activates websocket for remote control and sets password

inactivity_timer.title: Inactivity Timer
inactivity_timer.description: Send RRC connection release after this time (in ms) of network inactivity.

log_phy_debug.title: Physical layer log debug
log_phy_debug.description: Enable debug mode for physical layer logs

gps_sync.title: GPS synchronisation
gps_sync.description: True if GPS should be used for synchronisation

use_ipv4.title: Use IPv4
use_ipv4.description: Set to true to use IPv4 for AMF / MME addresses

enb_stats_fetch_period.title: eNB statistics fetch period (seconds)
enb_stats_fetch_period.description: Describes how often a call to Amarisoft remote API is made to get eNB statistics

enb_drb_stats_enabled.title: Enable eNB drb statistics
enb_drb_stats_enabled.description: Enable eNB drb statistics through 100Hz polling, needed for E-UTRAN IP Throughput KPI

max_rx_sample_db.title: Maximum RX sample value (dB)
max_rx_sample_db.description: Maximum RX sample threshold above which RX saturated promise will fail

min_rxtx_delay.title: Minimum available time for radio front end processing (ms)
min_rxtx_delay.description: Baseband latency promise will fail if minimum TX/RX diff reaches threshold (lower than this value)

xlog_fluentbit_forward_host.title: Address to Forward Xlog by Fluenbit
xlog_fluentbit_forward_host.description: Address of Remote Fluentd or Fluentbit Server to Forward Xlog

xlog_fluentbit_forward_port.title: Port to Forward Xlog by Fluentbit
xlog_fluentbit_forward_port.description: Optional Port of Remote Fluentd or Fluentbit Server to Forward Xlog

xlog_fluentbit_forward_shared_key.title: Shared Key to Forward Xlog by Fluentbit
xlog_fluentbit_forward_shared_key.description: Secret Key Shared with Remote Fluentd or Fluentbit Server for Authentication when Forwarding Xlog
